full_title: SLIDE by ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign
title: SLIDE

description.plain:
“Slide” was first previewed by Ty Dolla $ign at Le Baroque in Geneva, Switzerland on September 30, 2023. The song, with updated production, was then previewed twice by Fred again.. on November 4, 2023, at a DJ set in Los Angeles, where he spoke on his involvement on the song:

This is madness for me, I made this with my brother Ty a few months ago

The song was performed in full at the “Vultures Rave” in Miami on December 12, 2023, and used in an advertisement for the YZY PODS on December 28, 2023. A feature from James Blake was revealed on February 2, 2024, when North West was spotted sporting a shirt with an early tracklist for VULTURES 1. The song was played again on March 11, 2024, at a Vultures listening party in Arizona. An early version of the song dated to December 14, 2023 titled “Slidin” surfaced on July 7, 2024. The song has since been renamed to “Slide” and recieved a James Blake feature.

The song was officially released as a single on the Yeezy website on August 2nd, followed shortly thereafter by a release on TIDAL and other streaming services.
